channel.title: Help
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [Quote] from: goneby1233 on August 02, 2007, 06:55:37 PM is it possible to use MySQL without leaving my computer on?[/Quote]
[Quote]yes of couse use it if you have a webhost... and use phpmyadmin as i said. But you prolly dind't even read my tutorial. Your question goes in the help section...[/Quote][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 09:23:25 AM[/size][hr]so how can i put my server on my web host?

item.title: Help

item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

i have a site. www.the-gmrz.com and it has webspace on it. with mysql. google does shit. thats why i post here. help pls[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 09:38:05 AM[/size][hr]helpz? [br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 09:46:25 AM[/size][hr]ok look i got told to post on the help section so HELP :mad: :mad:

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

It’s possible,if you have a free hosting service from other sites to keep your MySQL on 24/7 for you.Try google.com
